mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (user_id, book_title, book_author) VALUES (#{userId}, #{bookTitle}, #{bookAuthor})
INSERT INTO book_image (book_image_url, book_id, user_id, book_image_name) VALUES (#{bookImageUrl}, #{bookId}, #{userId}, #{bookImageName})
INSERT INTO journal (start_page, end_page, review, book_id, user_id) VALUES (#{startPage}, #{endPage}, #{review}, #{bookId}, #{userId});
INSERT INTO memorable_phrase (phrase, page, journal_id) VALUES (#{phrase}, #{page}, #{journalId});
